gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 121, Timberwolves 107
gameRecap.excerpt: Zion Williamson led the Pelicans with a season-high 36 points (13-17 FG), along with five rebounds as they snapped a 6-game win streak for Minnesota and defeated them, 121-107. CJ McCollum (23 points) and Brandon Ingram (20 points) totaled 43 points for New Orleans. Karl-Anthony Towns led Minnesota with 17 points and 12 rebounds as Mike Conley added 17 points and seven assists. The Pelicans improve to 13-11 as the Timberwolves move to 17-5.
